queue.tooManyQueueItems: Exceeding the maximum item count of queue.
queue.fallbackNotice:
現在、通常の方法で情報を取得できなかったため、代わりの方法を使用しました。これが異常だと思われる場合はサポートまでお問い合わせください。
処理に時間がかかる、突然終了するなど、正常な動作をしない場合があります。万一問題が発生した場合、`リセット`コマンドを使用すると、サーバーのデータをすべて初期化することができます。
queue.spotifyNotice: Songs on Spotify may NOT be played correctly.
queue.noDescriptionInPlaylist: Details are unavailable due to be imported from the playlist.

search.resultFooterInteraction: Choose item(s) you want to play and select on the pull down. If you cancel, select "cancel". You can also check the thumbnail(s) by using command "thumbnail".
search.resultFooterMessage: Choose item(s) you want to play and send number(s) or select on the pull down. If you cancel, select/send "cancel". You can also check the thumbnail(s) by using command "thumbnail".
search.typeOrSelect: Type and send numbers or select here...
search.maximumSearch: Exceeded the limit of search results per server.

skip.howToUseSkipVote: If you approve skipping `{{title}}`, press the button below.
skip.skipVoteDescription: When requests for skipping become the majority, the current playing song will be skipped.
skip.skipRequirement_one: {{count}} more approval is needed to skip this song.
skip.skipRequirement_other: {{count}} more approvals are needed to skip this song.
